segments.source_content: Welcome to `Week 2, Day 4` of **#30DaysOfSWA**!!

translations.zh-CN: 欢迎来到 **#30DaysOfSWA** 的 `第2周第4天`！！

segments.source_content:
Today's a special day - the [1 year anniversary of Azure Static Web Apps](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/updates/azure-static-web-apps-is-now-generally-available/?WT.mc_id=30daysofswa-61155-cxall)!
**Happy Birthday SWA! 🎂**

translations.zh-CN:
今天是个特别的日子——[Azure Static Web Apps 发布一周年](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/updates/azure-static-web-apps-is-now-generally-available/?WT.mc_id=30daysofswa-61155-cxall)！
**SWA 生日快乐！🎂**

segments.source_content: I wanted to do something special to celebrate - and I thought of just the thing! Let's create a content-focused static website [with Docusaurus](https://docusaurus.io/) and deploy it [using Azure Static Web Apps](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/?WT.mc_id=30daysofswa-61155-cxall). Want to get a sense of what kinds of static sites you can build with Docusaurus? [Check out their showcase](https://docusaurus.io/showcase)!

translations.zh-CN: 我想用特别的方式来庆祝，正好有个绝妙的主意！让我们使用 [Docusaurus](https://docusaurus.io/) 创建一个内容型静态网站，并通过 [Azure Static Web Apps](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/?WT.mc_id=30daysofswa-61155-cxall) 部署它。想了解能用 Docusaurus 构建哪些静态网站？[查看他们的展示案例](https://docusaurus.io/showcase)！

segments.source_content: Why **this** demo today? Well, it's very _Meta_ (pun intended). You may have noticed that the [#30DaysOfSWA](https://aka.ms/30DaysOfSWA) website is built on Docusaurus. 🦖

translations.zh-CN: 为什么选择**这个**演示？因为它非常“元”（双关语）。你可能已经注意到 [#30DaysOfSWA](https://aka.ms/30DaysOfSWA) 网站就是用 Docusaurus 构建的。🦖

segments.source_content: By sharing this tutorial, I'm hoping it inspires more of you to build/deploy sites that showcase your own tech journeys - whether its with #30Days of learning, or to feature your #100Devs portfolios. #LetsGetStarted! 🎉

translations.zh-CN: 通过分享这个教程，我希望激励更多人构建/部署展示自己技术旅程的网站——无论是记录 #30Days 学习历程，还是展示 #100Devs 作品集。#现在开始吧！🎉

I hope to also contribute this back to the Docusaurus docs as an example for Deploying to Azure - feedback to improve this is very welcome!

segments.source_content: ## What is Docusaurus?

translations.zh-CN: ## 什么是 Docusaurus？

segments.source_content: Docusaurus is an open-source project from Meta that helps you build, deploy, and maintain, open source project websites. It was rated one of the top 3 [rising stars of JavaScript](https://docusaurus.io/) in 2021, under the _static site generators_ category. It has a number of features that made it attractive:

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 是 Meta 开源的静态网站生成器，可帮助构建、部署和维护开源项目网站。它在 2021 年被评为 JavaScript 生态中[上升最快的](https://docusaurus.io/)三大静态站点生成器之一，具有以下吸引人的特性：

segments.source_content:
* It has built-in support for search, localization and versioning
 * It support MDX (JSX-flavored Markdown) for richer content options
 * It has built-in support for themes and plugins to enhance default behaviors
 * It is built with React, making it extensible with custom components

translations.zh-CN:
* 内置搜索、本地化和版本控制支持
 * 支持 MDX（JSX 风格的 Markdown）实现更丰富的内容
 * 提供主题和插件系统扩展默认功能
 * 基于 React 构建，可通过自定义组件扩展

segments.source_content: Read their [documentation](https://docusaurus.io/docs) & visit their [showcase](https://docusaurus.io/showcase) to see real-world examples. Now, let's dive into our tutorial for building the demo.

translations.zh-CN: 阅读其[文档](https://docusaurus.io/docs)并查看[展示案例](https://docusaurus.io/showcase)了解实际应用。现在让我们开始构建演示项目。

segments.source_content: ## 1. Setup Site

translations.zh-CN: ## 1. 搭建站点

segments.source_content: 1. Setup a Docusaurus site (`classic` theme) in a dedicated folder (`www`) in repo. The command automatically installs the required packages and their dependencies.

translations.zh-CN: 1. 在仓库的专用文件夹(`www`)中搭建 Docusaurus 站点（使用`classic`主题）。该命令会自动安装所需包及其依赖项。

segments.source_content:
```bash
 npx create-docusaurus@latest www classic
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_ef0d086d

segments.source_content: 2. Let's see what was created for us. The output has been cleaned up for clarity.

translations.zh-CN: 2. 查看生成的文件结构。以下输出经过简化以便阅读。

segments.source_content:
```
ls -l www/

README.md   
babel.config.js 
blog/              
docs/    
docusaurus.config.js               
node_modules/        
package-lock.json    
package.json           
sidebars.js                 
src/                  
static/    
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5a41b4fb

segments.source_content: 3. Let's preview the site locally, to validate this worked.

translations.zh-CN: 3. 让我们在本地预览站点，验证是否成功。

segments.source_content:
```bash
cd www
npx docusaurus start

[INFO] Starting the development server...
[SUCCESS] Docusaurus website is running at http://localhost:3000/.
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a716abf2

segments.source_content: You should see something like this - this is the default landing page for the scaffolded Docusaurus site.

translations.zh-CN: 您应该会看到类似这样的界面——这是脚手架生成的Docusaurus站点默认首页。

segments.source_content: ![Landing Page](../static/img/series/11-landing.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Landing Page](../static/img/series/11-landing.png)

segments.source_content: 4. The dev server supports hot reloading. Try making a minor change to the site source - for example edit `docusaurus.config.js` and change the `title` to **"My Static Web Apps Site"**. You should see this in your site preview, instantly:

translations.zh-CN: 4. 开发服务器支持热重载。尝试修改站点源代码——例如编辑`docusaurus.config.js`文件，将`title`改为**"我的静态Web应用站点"**。您会立即在预览中看到变化：

segments.source_content: ![Landing Page Reloaded](../static/img/series/11-reload.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Landing Page Reloaded](../static/img/series/11-reload.png)

segments.source_content: 5. You can now build a **production-ready** version of that site as follows. Note that the static files are generated in the **build/** directory.

translations.zh-CN: 5. 现在可以通过以下命令构建**生产环境就绪**的站点版本。注意静态文件会生成在**build/**目录下。

segments.source_content:
```bash
cd www/
npm run build
..
..
[SUCCESS] Generated static files in "build".
[INFO] Use `npm run serve` command to test your build locally.
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_dc73c0d2

segments.source_content: ## 2. Deploy To Azure

translations.zh-CN: ## 2. 部署到Azure

segments.source_content: Docusaurus is built using React - so you can use [the same configuration settings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/front-end-frameworks) for Docusaurus, when deploying to Azure Static Web Apps.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus基于React构建——因此在部署到Azure静态Web应用时，可以使用[相同的配置设置](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/front-end-frameworks)。

segments.source_content: You have three options to  get started:

translations.zh-CN: 您有三种入门选择：

segments.source_content:
* via browser with [the Azure Portal quickstart](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/getting-started?tabs=react)
  * via terminal with [the Azure CLI quickstart](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/get-started-cli?tabs=vanilla-javascript)
  * via IDE with [the VS Code Extension quickstart](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/getting-started?tabs=vanilla-javascript)

translations.zh-CN:
* 通过浏览器使用[Azure门户快速入门](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/getting-started?tabs=react)
  * 通过终端使用[Azure CLI快速入门](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/get-started-cli?tabs=vanilla-javascript)
  * 通过IDE使用[VS Code扩展快速入门](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/getting-started?tabs=vanilla-javascript)

segments.source_content: If you prefer the first approach, click the button to go to the Azure portal, then follow the [quickstart](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/getting-started?tabs=react) guidance, but using *this* project's details instead.

translations.zh-CN: 若选择第一种方式，点击按钮跳转至Azure门户后，请按照[快速入门](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/getting-started?tabs=react)指南操作，但使用*本项目*的详细信息。

segments.source_content: [![Deploy to Azure button](https://aka.ms/deploytoazurebutton)](https://portal.azure.com/?feature.customportal=false&WT.mc_id=30daysofswa-61155-cxall#create/Microsoft.StaticApp)

translations.zh-CN: [![Deploy to Azure button](https://aka.ms/deploytoazurebutton)](https://portal.azure.com/?feature.customportal=false&WT.mc_id=30daysofswa-61155-cxall#create/Microsoft.StaticApp)

segments.source_content: ## 3... using VS Code

translations.zh-CN: ## 3... 使用VS Code

segments.source_content: I'll use the [Visual Studio Code extension](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/getting-started?tabs=vanilla-javascript) to make this happen with just a few clicks.

translations.zh-CN: 我将使用[Visual Studio Code扩展](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/getting-started?tabs=vanilla-javascript)通过几次点击完成部署。

segments.source_content: The whole process happens within the VS Code window, and takes just a few minutes from start to finish - _with guided prompts to help all the way_. For convenience, I've documented it step-by-step with screenshots (images valid for _VS Code ver 1.66.2_).

translations.zh-CN: 整个过程都在VS Code窗口内完成，从开始到结束只需几分钟——_并全程提供引导提示_。为方便起见，我已通过截图逐步记录（图片适用于_VS Code 1.66.2版本_）。

segments.source_content: ## 3.1 Install Extension

translations.zh-CN: ## 3.1 安装扩展

segments.source_content: Open Visual Studio Code (IDE) in the project folder for your repo. Install the [Azure Static Web Apps extension](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-azuretools.vscode-azurestaticwebapps) by visiting this page and clicking "Install".

translations.zh-CN: 在项目仓库目录中打开Visual Studio Code (IDE)。访问此页面点击"安装"，安装[Azure静态Web应用扩展](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-azuretools.vscode-azurestaticwebapps)。

segments.source_content: ![VS Code Extension for SWA](../static/img/series/11-extension.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![VS Code Extension for SWA](../static/img/series/11-extension.png)

segments.source_content: ## 3.2. Find SWA Panel

translations.zh-CN: ## 3.2 定位SWA面板

segments.source_content: When extension is installed, you should see this window in your VS Code editor, confirming readiness for use.

translations.zh-CN: 扩展安装完成后，您将在VS Code编辑器中看到此窗口，确认已准备就绪。

segments.source_content: ![VS Code Extension Installed](../static/img/series/11-vscode.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![VS Code Extension Installed](../static/img/series/11-vscode.png)

segments.source_content: You'll find the Azure Static Web Apps options listed in a  section under "Azure".

translations.zh-CN: 您会在"Azure"分类下找到Azure静态Web应用选项。

segments.source_content: The extension's [documentation page](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-azuretools.vscode-azurestaticwebapps) and its [GitHub](https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-azurestaticwebapps/wiki/Creating-a-Static-Web-App) page both provide detailed walkthroughs - check those for the most current process for this. We'll start by clicking the _Azure_ icon in the VS Code sidebar, then scrolling down till we see this `Static Web Apps` section.

translations.zh-CN: 该扩展的[文档页面](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-azuretools.vscode-azurestaticwebapps)及其[GitHub页面](https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-azurestaticwebapps/wiki/Creating-a-Static-Web-App)均提供了详细的操作指南——请查阅这些资源以获取最新流程。我们将首先点击VS Code侧边栏中的_Azure_图标，然后向下滚动直至看到`Static Web Apps`部分。

segments.source_content: ## 3.3 Create SWA

translations.zh-CN: ## 3.3 创建静态Web应用

segments.source_content: Click the "+" button to start the **Create Static Web App** workflow.

translations.zh-CN: 点击"+"按钮启动**创建静态Web应用**流程。

segments.source_content: ![Activate SWA Extension](../static/img/series/11-swa-plus.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![激活SWA扩展](../static/img/series/11-swa-plus.png)

segments.source_content: The _"Create Static Web Apps"_ process will create (and commit) a GitHub actions workflow for you that will automate the build/deploy process for your site directly from your source on all future codebase changes.

translations.zh-CN: _"创建静态Web应用"_流程将为您创建（并提交）一个GitHub Actions工作流，该工作流会从代码库源头自动构建和部署您的站点，并在未来所有代码变更时生效。

segments.source_content: So if you have _current pending codebase changes_ it will first prompt you to commit them before it does its magic! Let's get that done!

translations.zh-CN: 因此如果您有_当前待提交的代码变更_，系统会首先提示您提交这些更改！让我们完成这一步！

segments.source_content: ![Commit changes](../static/img/series/11-commit.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![提交变更](../static/img/series/11-commit.png)

translations.zh-CN: ## 3.4 配置SWA

translations.zh-CN: ## 3.5 跟踪进度

segments.source_content: In a few seconds, you'll see this alert - this indicates that the workflow is **creating and committing the GitHub Actions build/deploy workflow YAML** for you. 🎉

translations.zh-CN: 几秒钟后，您将看到此提示——这表示工作流正在**为您创建并提交GitHub Actions构建/部署工作流YAML文件**。🎉

segments.source_content: ![Created](../static/img/series/11-swa-created.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![已创建](../static/img/series/11-swa-created.png)

segments.source_content: If you check your repository right now, you'll find the [relevant commit](https://github.com/fearlessly-dev/swa-demo-docusaurus/commit/1005a16c10bbbce51c8526a3c14253d1aec1a59c) and the [activated Actions flow](https://github.com/fearlessly-dev/swa-demo-docusaurus/actions/runs/2313039968) (labeled `ci: add Azure Static Web Apps worfklow`) in progress.

translations.zh-CN: 如果立即查看代码仓库，您会发现[相关提交记录](https://github.com/fearlessly-dev/swa-demo-docusaurus/commit/1005a16c10bbbce51c8526a3c14253d1aec1a59c)和[已激活的Actions流程](https://github.com/fearlessly-dev/swa-demo-docusaurus/actions/runs/2313039968)（标记为`ci: add Azure Static Web Apps worfklow`）正在运行。

segments.source_content: You can also track the progress and configuration settings of your app right there in the VS Code Sidebar, under the `Static Web Apps` section. _Look for the project name, and unroll contents.._

translations.zh-CN: 您还可以直接在VS Code侧边栏的`Static Web Apps`部分跟踪应用进度和配置设置。_找到项目名称并展开内容..._

segments.source_content: ![Sidebar](../static/img/series/11-swa-sidebar.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![侧边栏](../static/img/series/11-swa-sidebar.png)

segments.source_content: ## 3.6 Browse Site!

translations.zh-CN: ## 3.6 浏览站点！

segments.source_content: In a few second more, you'll get this alert:

translations.zh-CN: 再过几秒钟，您将收到此提示：

segments.source_content: ![Deployed](../static/img/series/11-swa-deployed.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![已部署](../static/img/series/11-swa-deployed.png)

translations.zh-CN: 点击"浏览站点"即可访问已部署的Docusaurus网站！就这样！只需几次点击和默认配置调整——大功告成！

segments.source_content: ## 4. Customize It!

translations.zh-CN: ## 4. 自定义配置

segments.source_content: At this point, you can make any changes to the site source, commit them - and watch the site get rebuilt and deployed without any further action from you!

translations.zh-CN: 此时，您可以对站点源码进行任意修改，提交变更后——无需任何额外操作即可自动重建和部署站点！

segments.source_content: Here are some things to try:

translations.zh-CN: 以下是一些尝试建议：

segments.source_content:
* Customize [styles or layout](https://docusaurus.io/docs/styling-layout)
 * Explore [plugins](https://docusaurus.io/docs/api/plugins) for SEO, Search etc.
 * Try [create/use MDX](https://docusaurus.io/docs/markdown-features/react#using-jsx-in-markdown) in content

translations.zh-CN:
* 自定义[样式或布局](https://docusaurus.io/docs/styling-layout)
 * 探索SEO、搜索等[插件功能](https://docusaurus.io/docs/api/plugins)
 * 尝试在内容中[创建/使用MDX](https://docusaurus.io/docs/markdown-features/react#using-jsx-in-markdown)

segments.source_content: I made a few example changes to the `docusaurus.config.js` file to personalize the landing page content to reflect my needs.

translations.zh-CN: 我对`docusaurus.config.js`文件做了一些示例修改，使着陆页内容更符合我的个性化需求。

segments.source_content: And I updated the `src/css/custom.css` file to reflect new theme colors for dark/light mode - and replaced the `logo.svg` file.

translations.zh-CN: 我还更新了 `src/css/custom.css` 文件以适配新的深色/浅色模式主题色，并替换了 `logo.svg` 文件。

segments.source_content: Committing these changes should automatically rebuild and update the deployed site. Here is what they looked like in my local preview, before I committed the changes.

translations.zh-CN: 提交这些更改后，部署的站点将自动重建更新。以下是我在本地预览时的效果，提交更改前的状态。

segments.source_content: ## Exercise

translations.zh-CN: ## 实践任务

segments.source_content: You saw a few things I did to customize the site. Now it's your turn! Here are a few challenges you can try out:

translations.zh-CN: 您已看到我对站点进行的几项定制。现在轮到您了！以下是几个可供尝试的挑战：

segments.source_content:
* Complete the tutorial to deploy your own site!
 * Try Docusaurus customization: **add an MDX component!**
 * Try SWA customization: **add an API to fetch content!**
 * Try SWA customization: **add auth using Twitter - use it!**

translations.zh-CN:
* 完成教程部署您自己的站点！
 * 尝试 Docusaurus 定制：**添加一个 MDX 组件！**
 * 尝试 SWA 定制：**添加 API 获取内容！**
 * 尝试 SWA 定制：**通过 Twitter 添加身份验证功能并实际使用！**
